script: SetTooltip SEED_ngcQuickStart "A Scarab-class equipped with an obscure, Domain-era time-travel device, sent to survey the Persean Sector before its fateful day.\n\nIntended only to gather information for a SEED report - the sector is unlikely to survive this space-time intrusion unscathed."
options: -1:SEED_ngcQuickStart:A time traveler, commanding a Scarab-class frigate (instant start)

script:
NGCAddShip scarab_Starting
NGCSetDifficulty normal
$ngcSkipTutorial = true
NGCSetWithTimePass false
NGCSetStartingLocation Duzahk -2650 3250
NGCAddStandardStartingScript
NGCDone
